parameters.content:
## Brevo Email Marketing Automation

Step 1: Get new contacts marked "Not Added" from the "New Contacts" tab in the "Email Marketing - Brevo" Google Sheet.

Step 2: Add or upsert these contacts (email, name, job title) into Brevo's contact list via the Brevo API.

Step 3: Send an initial email using a predefined template to each new contact from Brevo.

Step 4: Update the Google Sheet status for each contact to "Added" and record the date when the email was sent in the "Emailed Contacts" tab.

Step 5: Monitor email engagement (opens, clicks) through Brevo webhook triggers.

Step 6: Update engagement status (e.g., "Clicked") in Google Sheets accordingly.

Step 7: Check email sending credits on the Brevo account and send notifications via Google Chat if limits are near or exceeded.

Step 8: Handle batch processing and delays to conform with Brevo API rate limits.

Step 9: Delete contacts from Brevo after completing the campaign and update Google Sheet to keep records consistent.

Step 10: Synchronize and manage contacts across multiple tabs ("New Contacts," "Emailed Contacts," "Triggered Contacts," "Cold Call Contacts") within the Google Sheet for organized tracking and next actions.
